STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.AIRFILTER.NAME: <link="AIRFILTER">Deodorizer</link>
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ALGAEDISTILLER: Algae distillers convert disease-causing slime into algae for oxygen production.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ALGAEHABITAT.D: Algae colony, Duplicant colony... we're more alike than we are different.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ALGAEHABITAT.E:
Consumes <link="ALGAE">Algae</link> to produce <link="OXYGEN">Oxygen</link> and remove some <link="CARBONDIOXIDE">Carbon Dioxide</link>.

Gains a 10% efficiency boost in direct <link="LIGHT">Light</link>.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.APOTHECARY.DES: Some medications help prevent diseases, while others aim to alleviate existing illness.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.APOTHECARY.EFF:
Produces <link="MEDICINE">Medicine</link> to cure most basic <link="DISEASE">Diseases</link>.

Duplicants must possess the Medicine Compounding <link="ROLES">Skill</link> to fabricate medicines.

Duplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
Komet Kablam-O!
For up to two players.

Allows Duplicants to play video games on their breaks.

Increases Duplicant <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ASTRONAUTTRAIN: Duplicants must complete astronaut training in order to pilot space rockets.

Trains Duplicants to become <link="ASTRONAUT">Astronauts</link>.

Duplicants must possess the <link="ASTRONAUTTRAINEE">Astronaut-in-Training</link> trait to receive training.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.AUTOMINER.DESC: A robo-miner's range can be viewed at any time by selecting the building.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.AUTOMINER.EFFE: Automatically digs out all materials in a set range.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.AUTOMINER.NAME: <link="AUTOMINER">Robo-Miner</link>
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BATTERY.DESC: Batteries allow power from generators to be stored for later.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BATTERY.EFFECT:
Stores <link="POWER">Power</link> from generators, then provides that <link="POWER">Power</link> to buildings.

Loses charge over time.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BATTERY.NAME: <link="BATTERY">Battery</link>
Larger batteries hold more power and keep systems running longer before recharging.

Stores <link="POWER">Power</link> from generators, then provides that <link="POWER">Power</link> to buildings.

Slightly loses charge over time.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BATTERYSMART.A: Sends a Green Signal when battery is less than {0}% charged
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BATTERYSMART.D: Sends a Red Signal when battery is more than {0}% charged
Smart batteries send a Green Signal when they require charging.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BATTERYSMART.E: Stores Power from generators, then provides that Power to buildings. Sends a Green Signal or Red Signal based on the configuration of the Logic Activation Parameters. Very slightly loses charge over time.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BATTERYSMART.L: Sends a Green Signal when battery is less than Low Threshold charged
Sends a Red Signal when the battery is more than High Threshold charged, until Low Threshold is reached again
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BEACHCHAIR.DES: Soak up some relaxing sun rays.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BEACHCHAIR.EFF:
Duplicants can relax by lounging in <link="LIGHT">Sunlight</link>.

Increases Duplicants <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BED.DESC: Duplicants without a bed will develop sore backs from sleeping on the floor.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BED.EFFECT:
Gives one Duplicant a place to sleep.

Duplicants will automatically return to their cots to sleep at night.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BED.NAME: <link="BED">Cot</link>
A bottle emptier's Element Filter can be used to designate areas for specific liquid storage.
Empties bottled <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquids</link> back into the world.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BOTTLEEMPTIERG: A canister emptier's Element Filter can designate areas for specific gas storage.
Empties <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> canisters back into the world.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BUNKERDOOR.DES: A massive, slow-moving door which is nearly indestructible.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BUNKERDOOR.EFF:
Blocks <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> and <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> flow, maintaining pressure between areas.

Can withstand extremely high pressures and impacts.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BUNKERTILE.DES: Bunker tile can build strong shelters in otherwise dangerous environments.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BUNKERTILE.EFF:
Used to build the walls and floors of rooms.

Can withstand extreme pressures and impacts.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CANVAS.DESC: Once built, a Duplicant can paint a blank canvas to produce a decorative painting.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CANVAS.EFFECT:
Increases <link="DECOR">Decor</link>, contributing to <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.

Must be painted by a Duplicant.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CANVAS.NAME: <link="CANVAS">Blank Canvas</link>
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CANVASTALL.DES: Once built, a Duplicant can paint a blank canvas to produce a decorative painting.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CANVASTALL.EFF:
Moderately increases <link="DECOR">Decor</link>, contributing to <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.

Must be painted by a Duplicant.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CANVASWIDE.DES: Once built, a Duplicant can paint a blank canvas to produce a decorative painting.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CANVASWIDE.EFF:
Moderately increases <link="DECOR">Decor</link>, contributing to <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.

Must be painted by a Duplicant.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CARGOBAY.DESC: Duplicants will fill cargo bays with any resources they find during space missions.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CARGOBAY.EFFEC:
Allows Duplicants to store any <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid</link> resources found during space missions.

Stored resources become available to the colony upon the rocket's return.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CARGOBAY.NAME: <link="CARGOBAY">Cargo Bay</link>
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CARPETTILE.EFF:
Used to build the walls and floors of rooms.

Increases <link="DECOR">Decor</link>, contributing to <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CEILINGLIGHT.D: Light reduces Duplicant stress and is required to grow certain plants.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CEILINGLIGHT.E:
Provides <link="LIGHT">Light</link> when <link="POWER">Powered</link>.

Duplicants can operate buildings more quickly when the building is lit.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CHECKPOINT.DES: Checkpoints can be connected to automated sensors to determine when it's safe to enter.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CHECKPOINT.EFF: Allows Duplicants to pass when receiving a Green Signal. Prevents Duplicants from passing when receiving a Red Signal.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CLOTHINGFABRIC: A textile loom can be used to spin Reed Fiber into wearable Duplicant clothing.

Tailors Duplicant <link="EQUIPMENT">Clothing</link> items.

Duplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CO2SCRUBBER.DE: Skimmers remove large amounts of carbon dioxide, but produce no breathable air.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CO2SCRUBBER.EF: Uses <link="WATER">Water</link> to filter <link="CARBONDIOXIDE">Carbon Dioxide</link> from the air.
Networks of many scanners will scan more efficiently than one on its own.
Sends a Green Signal to its automation circuit when it detects incoming objects from space. Can be configured to detect incoming meteor showers or returning space rockets.
At least one astronaut must be assigned to the command module to pilot a rocket.

Contains passenger seating for Duplicant <link="ASTRONAUT">Astronauts</link>.

A Command Capsule must be the last module installed at the top of a rocket
Sends a Green Signal when its rocket launch checklist is complete
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.COMPOST.DESC: Composts safely deal with biological waste, producing fresh dirt.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.COMPOST.EFFECT: Reduces <link="TOXICSAND">Polluted Dirt</link> and other compostables down into <link="DIRT">Dirt</link>.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.COMPOST.NAME: <link="COMPOST">Compost</link>
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CONDUIT.STATUS: Awaiting a <link="PLUMBER">Plumber</link> to clear this pipe
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.COOKINGSTATION: Proper cooking eliminates foodborne disease and produces tasty, stress-relieving meals.

Cooks a wide variety of improved <link="FOOD">Foods</link>.

Duplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CORNERMOULDING: Corner moulding is used as purely decorative trim for ceiling corners.

Used to decorate the ceiling corners of rooms.

Increases <link="DECOR">Decor</link>, contributing to <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.COSMICRESEARCH: Planetariums allow the simulated exploration of locations discovered with a telescope.

Conducts <link="RESEARCH">Interstellar Research</link> using data from <link="TELESCOPE">Telescopes</link> and <link="RESEARCHMODULE">Research Modules</link>.

Assigned Duplicants must possess the <link="SENIORRESEARCHER">Planetarium Researching</link> trait.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CREATUREDELIVE: Duplicants automatically bring captured critters to these relocation points for release.

Releases trapped <link="CRITTERS">Critters</link> back into the world.

Can be used multiple times.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CREATUREFEEDER: Critters tend to stay close to their food source and wander less when given a feeder.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CREATURETRAP.D: Critter traps cannot catch swimming or flying critters.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CREATURETRAP.E:
Captures a living <link="CRITTERS">Critter</link> for transport.

Single use.
Crown moulding is used as purely decorative trim for ceilings.

Used to decorate the ceilings of rooms.

Increases <link="DECOR">Decor</link>, contributing to <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DESALINATOR.DE: Salt can be refined into table salt for a mealtime morale boost.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DININGTABLE.DE: Duplicants prefer to dine at a table, rather than eat off the floor.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DININGTABLE.EF:
Gives one Duplicant a place to eat.

Duplicants will automatically eat at their assigned table when hungry.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DIRECTIONALWOR: Channels move more volume than pumps and require no power, but need sufficient pressure to function.

Directionally moves large volumes of <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">LIQUID</link> through a channel.

Can be used as floor tile and rotated before construction.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DISTILLATIONCO: Separates any <link="DIRTYWATER">Contaminated Water</link> piped through it into <link="STEAM">Steam</link> and <link="TOXICSAND">Polluted Dirt</link>.
Sick bays can be placed in hospital rooms to decrease the likelihood of disease spreading.

Allows Duplicants to administer basic treatments to sick Duplicants.

Duplicants must possess the Bedside Manner <link="ROLES">Skill</link> to treat peers.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DOOR.CONTROL_S: Duplicants open and close this door as needed
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DOOR.DESC: Door controls can be used to prevent Duplicants from entering restricted areas.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DOOR.EFFECT:
Encloses areas without blocking <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> or <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> flow.

Wild <link="CRITTERS">Critters</link> cannot pass through doors.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DOOR.NAME: <link="DOOR">Pneumatic Door</link>
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.EGGCRACKER.DES: Raw eggs are an ingredient in certain high quality food recipes.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.EGGCRACKER.EFF:
Converts viable <link="CRITTERS">Critter</link> eggs into cooking ingredients.

Cracked Eggs cannot hatch.

Duplicants will not crack eggs unless tasks are queued.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.EGGINCUBATOR.D: Incubators can maintain the ideal internal conditions for several species of critter egg.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.EGGINCUBATOR.E:
Incubates <link="CRITTERS">Critter</link> eggs until ready to hatch.

Assigned Duplicants must possess the <link="RANCHER">Critter Wrangling</link> trait.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ELECTROLYZER.D: Water goes in one end, life sustaining oxygen comes out the other.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ELECTROLYZER.E:
Converts <link="WATER">Water</link> into <link="OXYGEN">Oxygen</link> and <link="HYDROGEN">Hydrogen</link>.

Becomes idle when the area reaches maximum pressure capacity.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ESPRESSOMACHIN: A shot of espresso helps Duplicants relax after a long day.

Provides refreshment for Duplicants on their breaks.

Increases Duplicant <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ETHANOLDISTILL: Ethanol distillers convert Lumber into burnable <link="ETHANOL">Ethanol</link> fuel.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ETHANOLGENERAT: Ethanol generators require less Duplicant operation, but produce significant waste.

Converts <link="ETHANOL">Ethanol</link> into electrical <link="POWER">Power</link>.

Produces <link="CARBONDIOXIDE">Carbon Dioxide</link> and <link="DIRTYWATER">Polluted Water</link>.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.EXTERIORWALL.D: Drywall can be used in conjunction with tiles to build airtight rooms on the surface.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.EXTERIORWALL.E:
Prevents <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> and <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> loss in space.

Builds an insulating backwall behind buildings.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FARMSTATION.DE: This station only has an effect on crops grown within the same room.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FARMSTATION.EF:
Produces <link="FARMSTATIONTOOLS">Micronutrient Fertilizer</link> to increase <link="PLANTS">Plant</link> growth rates.

Assigned Duplicants must possess the <link="FARMER">Crop Tending</link> trait.

This building is a necessary component of the Greenhouse room.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FARMTILE.DESC: Duplicants can deliver fertilizer and liquids to farm tiles, accelerating plant growth.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FARMTILE.EFFEC:
Grows one <link="PLANTS">Plant</link> from a <link="PLANTS">Seed</link>.

Can be used as floor tile and rotated before construction.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FARMTILE.NAME: <link="FARMTILE">Farm Tile</link>
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FERTILIZERMAKE: Fertilizer synthesizers convert polluted dirt into fertilizer for domestic plants.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FIREPOLE.DESC: Build these in addition to ladders for efficient upward and downward movement.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FIREPOLE.EFFEC:
Allows rapid Duplicant descent.

Significantly slows upward climbing.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FIREPOLE.NAME: <link="FIREPOLE">Fire Pole</link>
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FISHDELIVERYPO: A fish release must be built above liquid to prevent released fish from suffocating.

Releases trapped <link="PACU">Pacu</link> back into the world.

Can be used multiple times.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FISHFEEDER.DES: Build this feeder above a body of water to feed the fish within.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FISHFEEDER.EFF:
Automatically dispenses stored <link="CRITTERS">Critter</link> food into the area below.

Dispenses once per day.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FISHTRAP.DESC: Trapped fish will automatically be bagged for transport.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FISHTRAP.EFFEC:
Attracts and traps swimming <link="PACU">Pacu</link>.

Single use.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FISHTRAP.NAME: <link="FISHTRAP">Fish Trap</link>
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLOORLAMP.DESC: Any building's light emitting radius can be viewed in the light overlay.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLOORLAMP.EFFE:
Provides <link="LIGHT">Light</link> when <link="POWER">Powered</link>.

Duplicants can operate buildings more quickly when the building is lit.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLOORLAMP.NAME: <link="FLOORLAMP">Lamp</link>
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLOORSWITCH.DE: Weight plates can be used to turn on amenities only when Duplicants pass by.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLOORSWITCH.EF: Sends a Green Signal when an object or Duplicant is placed atop of it. Cannot be triggered by Gas or Liquids.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLOWERVASE.DES: Flower pots allow decorative plants to be moved to new locations.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLOWERVASE.EFF:
Houses a single <link="PLANTS">Plant</link> when sown with a <link="PLANTS">Seed</link>.

Increases <link="DECOR">Decor</link>, contributing to <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLOWERVASEHANG: Hanging pots can add some Decor to a room, without blocking buildings on the floor.

Houses a single <link="PLANTS">Plant</link> when sown with a <link="PLANTS">Seed</link>.

Increases <link="DECOR">Decor</link>, contributing to <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.

Must be hung from a ceiling.
Aero pots can be hung from the ceiling and have extremely high Decor.

Houses a single <link="PLANTS">Plant</link> when sown with a <link="PLANTS">Seed</link>.

Increases <link="DECOR">Decor</link>, contributing to <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.

Must be hung from a ceiling.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLOWERVASEWALL: Placing a plant in a wall pot can add a spot of Decor to otherwise bare walls.

Houses a single <link="PLANTS">Plant</link> when sown with a <link="PLANTS">Seed</link>.

Increases <link="DECOR">Decor</link>, contributing to <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.

Must be hung from a wall.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLUSHTOILET.DE: Lavatories transmit fewer germs to Duplicants' skin and require no emptying.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLUSHTOILET.EF:
Gives Duplicants a place to relieve themselves.

Spreads very few <link="DISEASE">Germs</link>.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLYINGCREATURE: The type of critter attracted by critter bait depends on the construction material.

Attracts one type of airborne critter.

Single use.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GANTRY.DESC: A gantry can be built over rocket pieces where ladders and tile cannot.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GANTRY.EFFECT: Provides scaffolding across rocket modules to allow Duplicant access.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GANTRY.LOGIC_P: Extends gantry when a Green Signal signal is received
Retracts gantry when a Red Signal signal is received
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GANTRY.NAME: <link="GANTRY">Gantry</link>
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASBOTTLER.DES: Canisters allow Duplicants to manually deliver gases from place to place.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASBOTTLER.EFF: Automatically stores piped <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gases</link> into canisters for manual transport.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASCARGOBAY.DE: Duplicants fill cargo canisters with any resources they find during space missions.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASCARGOBAY.EF:
Allows Duplicants to store any <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> resources found during space missions.

Stored resources become available to the colony upon the rocket's return.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASCONDUIT.DES: Gas pipes are used to connect the inputs and outputs of ventilated buildings.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASCONDUIT.EFF:
Carries <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> between <link="GASPIPING">Outputs</link> and <link="GASPIPING">Intakes</link>.

Can be run through wall and floor tile.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASCONDUITBRID: Separate pipe systems prevent mingled contents from causing building damage.

Runs one <link="GASPIPING">Gas Pipe</link> section over another without joining them.

Can be run through wall and floor tile.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASCONDUITDISE: Germ sensors can help control automation behavior in the presence of germs.
Sends a Green Signal or a Red Signal based on the internal Germ count of the pipe.
Sends a Green Signal if the number of Germs in the pipe is within the selected range
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASCONDUITELEM: Element sensors can be used to detect the presence of a specific gas in a pipe.
Sends a Green Signal when the selected Gas is detected within a pipe.
Sends a Green Signal if the configured Gas is detected
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASCONDUITOVER: Overflow valves can be used to prioritize which buildings should receive precious resources first.
Fills a secondary<link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> output only when its primary output is blocked.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASCONDUITPREF: Priority flows ensure important buildings are filled first when on a system with other buildings.
Diverts <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> to a secondary input when its primary input overflows.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASCONDUITRADI: Radiant pipes pumping cold gas can be run through hot areas to help cool them down.

Carries <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link>, allowing extreme <link="HEAT">Temperature</link> exchange with the surrounding environment.

Can be run through wall and floor tile.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASCONDUITTEMP: Thermo sensors disable buildings when their pipe contents reach a certain temperature.
Sends a Green Signal or a Red Signal when pipe contents enter the chosen Temperature range.
Sends a Green Signal if the contained Gas is within the selected Temperature range
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASFILTER.DESC: All gases are sent into the building's output pipe, except the gas chosen for filtering.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASFILTER.EFFE: Sieves one <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> from the air, sending it into a dedicated <link="GASPIPING">Pipe</link>.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASFILTER.NAME: <link="GASFILTER">Gas Filter</link>
Automated piping saves power and time by removing the need for Duplicant input.
Connects to an <link="LOGIC">Automation</link> grid to automatically turn <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> flow on or off.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASMINIPUMP.DE: Mini pumps are useful for moving small quantities of gas with minimum power.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASMINIPUMP.EF:
Draws in a small amount of <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> and runs it through <link="GASPIPING">Pipes</link>.

Must be immersed in <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link>.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASPERMEABLEME: Building with airflow tile promotes better gas circulation within a colony.

Used to build the walls and floors of rooms.

Blocks <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> flow without obstructing <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link>.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASPUMP.DESC: Piping a pump's output to a building's intake will send gas to that building.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASPUMP.EFFECT:
Draws in <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> and runs it through <link="GASPIPING">Pipes</link>.

Must be immersed in <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link>.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASPUMP.NAME: <link="GASPUMP">Gas Pump</link>
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASRESERVOIR.D: Reservoirs cannot receive manually delivered resources.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASRESERVOIR.E: Stores any <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> resources piped into it.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASVALVE.DESC: Valves control the amount of gas that moves through pipes, preventing waste.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASVALVE.NAME: <link="GASVALVE">Gas Valve</link>
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASVENT.DESC: Vents are an exit point for gases from ventilation systems.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASVENT.NAME: <link="GASVENT">Gas Vent</link>
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASVENTHIGHPRE: High pressure vents can expel gas into more highly pressurized environments.
Releases <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> from <link="GASPIPING">Gas Pipes</link> into high pressure locations.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GENERATOR.DESC: Burning coal produces more energy than manual power, but emits heat and exhaust.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GENERATOR.NAME: <link="GENERATOR">Coal Generator</link>
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GENERICFABRICA: Omniprinters are incapable of printing organic matter.
Converts <link="RAWMINERAL">Raw Mineral</link> into unique materials and objects.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GENESHUFFLER.D:
A massive synthetic brain, suspended in saline solution.

There is a chair attached to the device with room for one person.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GLASSFORGE.DES: Glass can be used to construct window tile.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GLASSFORGE.EFF:
Produces <link="MOLTENGLASS">Molten Glass</link> from raw <link="SAND">Sand</link>.

Outputs <link="HEAT">High Temperature</link> <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link>.

Duplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GLASSTILE.DESC: Window tiles provide a barrier against liquid and gas and are completely transparent.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GLASSTILE.EFFE:
Used to build the walls and floors of rooms.

Allows <link="LIGHT">Light</link> and <link="DECOR">Decor</link> to pass through.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GLASSTILE.NAME: <link="GLASSTILE">Window Tile</link>
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GOURMETCOOKING: Luxury meals increase Duplicants morale and prevents them from becoming stressed.

Cooks a wide variety of quality <link="FOOD">Foods</link>.

Duplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GRAVE.DESC: Burying dead Duplicants reduces health hazards and stress on the colony.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GRAVE.EFFECT:
Provides a final resting place for deceased Duplicants.

Living Duplicants will automatically place an unburied corpse inside.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GRAVE.NAME: <link="GRAVE">Tasteful Memorial</link>
Hand sanitizers kill germs more effectively than wash basins.

Removes most <link="DISEASE">Germs</link> from Duplicants.

Germ-covered Duplicants use Hand Sanitizers when passing by in the selected direction.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.HEADQUARTERS.D: New Duplicants come out here, but thank goodness, they never go back in.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.HEADQUARTERS.E:
An exceptionally advanced bioprinter of unknown origin.

It periodically produces new Duplicants or care packages containing resources.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.HIGHWATTAGEWIR: Higher wattage wire is used to avoid power overloads, particularly for strong generators.

Carries more <link="POWER">Wattage</link> than regular <link="WIRE">Wire</link> without overloading.

Cannot be run through wall and floor tile.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.HOTTUB.DESC: Relaxes Duplicants with massaging jets of heated liquid.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.HOTTUB.EFFECT:
Requires <link="LIQUIDPIPING">Pipes</link> to and from tub and <link="POWER">Power</link> to run the jets.

Water must be a comfortable temperature and will cool rapidly.

Increases Duplicant <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.HOTTUB.NAME: <link="HOTTUB">Hot Tub</link>
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.HYDROGENENGINE: Hydrogen engines can propel rockets further than steam or petroleum engines.

Burns <link="LIQUIDHYDROGEN">Liquid Hydrogen</link> to propel rockets for space exploration.

The engine of a rocket must be built first before more rocket modules may be added.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.HYDROGENGENERA: Hydrogen generators are extremely efficient, emitting next to no waste.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.HYDROPONICFARM: Hydroponic farms reduce Duplicant traffic by automating irrigating crops.

Grows one <link="PLANTS">Plant</link> from a <link="PLANTS">Seed</link>.

Can be used as floor tile and rotated before construction.

Must be irrigated through <link="LIQUIDPIPING">Liquid Piping</link>.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ICECOOLEDFAN.D: A Duplicant can work an Ice-E fan to temporarily cool small areas as needed.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ICECOOLEDFAN.E: Uses <link="ICE">Ice</link> to dissipate a small amount of the <link="HEAT">Heat</link>.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ICEMACHINE.DES: Ice makers can be used as a small renewable source of ice.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ICESCULPTURE.E:
Majorly increases <link="DECOR">Decor</link>, contributing to <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.

Must be sculpted by a Duplicant.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.INSULATEDGASCO: Pipe insulation prevents gas contents from significantly changing temperature in transit.

Carries <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> with minimal change in <link="HEAT">Temperature</link>.

Can be run through wall and floor tile.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.INSULATEDLIQUI: Pipe insulation prevents liquid contents from significantly changing temperature in transit.

Carries <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> with minimal change in <link="HEAT">Temperature</link>.

Can be run through wall and floor tile.
This stuff won't go melting if things get heated.

Connects buildings to <link="POWER">Power</link> sources in extreme <link="HEAT">Heat</link>.

Can be run through wall and floor tile.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.INSULATIONTILE: The low thermal conductivity of insulated tiles slows any heat passing through them.

Used to build the walls and floors of rooms.

Reduces <link="HEAT">Heat</link> transfer between walls, retaining ambient heat in an area.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ITEMPEDESTAL.D: Perception can be drastically changed by a bit of thoughtful presentation.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ITEMPEDESTAL.E:
Displays a single object, doubling its <link="DECOR">Decor</link> value.

Objects with negative Decor will gain some positive Decor when displayed.
Jet Suit Docks can refill jet suits with air and fuel, or empty them of waste.

Stores and refuels <link="JETSUIT">Jet Suits</link> with <link="OXYGEN">Oxygen</link> and <link="PETROLEUM">Petroleum</link>.

Build next to a <link="JETSUITMARKER">Jet Suit Checkpoint</link> to make Duplicants change into suits when passing by.
A checkpoint must have a jet suit dock built on the opposite side its arrow faces.

Marks a threshold where Duplicants must change into or out of <link="JETSUIT">Jet Suits</link>.

Must be built next to a <link="JETSUITLOCKER">Jet Suit Dock</link>

Can be rotated before construction.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.JUICER.DESC: Fruity juice can really brighten a Duplicant's breaktime
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.JUICER.EFFECT:
Provides refreshment for Duplicants on their breaks.

Drinking juice increases Duplicant <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.JUICER.NAME: <link="JUICER">Juicer</link>
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.KEROSENEENGINE: Rockets can be used to send Duplicants into space and retrieve rare resources.

Burns <link="PETROLEUM">Petroleum</link> to propel rockets for space exploration.

The engine of a rocket must be built first before more rocket modules may be added.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.KILN.DESC: Kilns can also be used to refine coal into pure carbon.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.KILN.EFFECT:
Fires <link="CLAY">Clay</link> to produce <link="CERAMIC">Ceramic</link>.

Duplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.KILN.NAME: <link="KILN">Kiln</link>
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LADDER.NAME: <link="LADDER">Ladder</link>
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LADDERFAST.DES: Plastic ladders are mildly antiseptic and can help limit the spread of germs in a colony.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDCARGOBAY: Duplicants will fill cargo tanks with whatever resources they find during space missions.

Allows Duplicants to store any <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> resources found during space missions.

Stored resources become available to the colony upon the rocket's return.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDCONDITIO: A thermo aquatuner cools liquid and outputs the heat elsewhere.
Cools the <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> piped through it, but outputs <link="HEAT">Heat</link> in its immediate vicinity.
Liquid pipes are used to connect the inputs and outputs of plumbed buildings.

Carries <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> between <link="LIQUIDPIPING">Outputs</link> and <link="LIQUIDPIPING">Intakes</link>.

Can be run through wall and floor tile.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDCONDUITB: Separate pipe systems help prevent building damage caused by mingled pipe contents.

Runs one <link="LIQUIDPIPING">Liquid Pipe</link> section over another without joining them.

Can be run through wall and floor tile.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDCONDUITD: Germ sensors can help control automation behavior in the presence of germs.
Sends a Green Signal or a Red Signal based on the internal Germ count of the pipe.
Sends a Green Signal if the number of Germs in the pipe is within the selected range
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDCONDUITE: Element sensors can be used to detect the presence of a specific liquid in a pipe.
Sends a Green Signal when the selected Liquid is detected within a pipe.
Sends a Green Signal if the configured Liquid is detected within the pipe
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDCONDUITO: Overflow valves can be used to prioritize which buildings should receive precious resources first.
Fills a secondary<link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> output only when its primary output is blocked.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDCONDUITP: Priority flows ensure important buildings are filled first when on a system with other buildings.
Diverts <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> to a secondary input when its primary input overflows.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDCONDUITR: Radiant pipes pumping cold liquid can be run through hot areas to help cool them down.

Carries <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link>, allowing extreme <link="HEAT">Temperature</link> exchange with the surrounding environment.

Can be run through wall and floor tile.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDCONDUITT: Thermo sensors disable buildings when their pipe contents reach a certain temperature.
Sends a Green Signal or a Red Signal when pipe contents enter the chosen Temperature range.
Sends a Green Signal if the contained Liquid is within the selected Temperature range
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDCOOLEDFA: A Duplicant can work a hydrofan to temporarily cool small areas as needed.
Dissipates a small amount of the <link="HEAT">Heat</link>.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDFILTER.D: All liquids are sent into the building's output pipe, except the liquid chosen for filtering.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDFILTER.E:
Sieves one <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> out of a mix, sending it into a dedicated <link="LIQUIDPIPING">Filtered Output Pipe</link>.

Can only filter one liquid type at a time.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDFUELTANK: Storing additional fuel increases the distance a rocket can travel before returning.

Stores the <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> fuel piped into it to supply rocket engines.

The stored fuel type is determined by the rocket engine it is built upon.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDHEATER.D: Tepidizers heat liquid which can kill waterborne germs.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDHEATER.E:
Warms large bodies of <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link>.

Must be fully submerged.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDLOGICVAL: Automated piping saves power and time by removing the need for Duplicant input.
Connects to an <link="LOGIC">Automation</link> grid to automatically turn <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> flow on or off.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDMINIPUMP: Mini pumps are useful for moving small quantities of liquid with minimum power.

Draws in a small amount of <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> and runs it through <link="LIQUIDPIPING">Pipes</link>.

Must be submerged in <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link>.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDPUMP.DES: Piping a pump's output to a building's intake will send liquid to that building.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDPUMP.EFF:
Draws in <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> and runs it through <link="LIQUIDPIPING">Pipes</link>.

Must be submerged in <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link>.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDPUMPINGS: Pitcher pumps allow Duplicants to bottle and deliver liquids from place to place.

Manually pumps <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> into bottles for transport.

Duplicants can only carry liquids that are bottled.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDRESERVOI: Reservoirs cannot receive manually delivered resources.
Stores any <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> resources piped into it.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDVALVE.DE: Valves control the amount of liquid that moves through pipes, preventing waste.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDVENT.DES: Vents are an exit point for liquids from plumbing systems.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICCRITTERCO: Detecting critter populations can help adjust their automated feeding and care regiments.
Sends a Green Signal or a Red Signal based on the number of eggs and critters in a room.
Sends a Green Signal if the number of Critters and Eggs in the Room is greater than the selected threshold.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICDISEASESE: Detecting germ populations can help block off or clean up dangerous areas.
Sends a Green Signal or a Red Signal based on quantity of surrounding Germs.
Sends a Green Signal if the number of Germs is within the selected range
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICDUPLICANT: Motion sensors save power by only enabling buildings when Duplicants are nearby.
Sends a Green Signal or a Red Signal based on whether a Duplicant is in the sensor's range.
Sends a Green Signal while a Duplicant is in the sensor's tile range
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICELEMENTSE: These sensors can detect the presence of a specific gas and alter systems accordingly.
Sends a Green Signal when the selected Gas is detected on this sensor's tile. Sends a Red Signal when the selected Gas is not present.
Sends a Green Signal if the selected Gas is detected
These sensors can detect the presence of a specific liquid and alter systems accordingly.
Sends a Green Signal when the selected Liquid is detected on this sensor's tile. Sends a Red Signal when the selected Liquid is not present.
Sends a Green Signal if the selected Liquid is detected
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATEAND.D: This gate outputs a Green Signal when both its inputs are receiving Green Signals at the same time.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATEAND.E: Outputs a Green Signal when both Input A AND Input B are receiving Green. Outputs a Red Signal when even one Input is receiving Red.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATEAND.O: Sends a Green Signal if both Inputs are receiving Green
Sends a Red Signal if any Input is receiving Red
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATEBUFFE: This gate continues outputting a Green Signal for a short time after the gate stops receiving a Green Signal.
Outputs a Green Signal if the Input is receiving a Green Signal. Continues sending a Green Signal for an amount of buffer time after the Input receives a Red Signal.
Sends a Green Signal while receiving Green. After receiving Red, will continue sending Green until the timer has expired
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATEFILTE: This gate only lets a Green Signal through if its Input has received a Green Signal that lasted longer than the selected filter time.
Only lets a Green Signal through if the Input has received a Green Signal for longer than the selected filter time. Will continue outputting a Red Signal if the Green Signal did not last long enough.
Sends a Green Signal after receiving Green for longer than the selected filter timer
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATENOT.D: This gate reverses automation signals, turning a Green Signal into a Red Signal and vice versa.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATENOT.E: Outputs a Green Signal if the Input is receiving a Red Signal. Outputs a Red Signal when its Input is receiving a Green Signal.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATEOR.DE: This gate outputs a Green Signal if receiving one or more Green Signals.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATEOR.EF: Outputs a Green Signal if at least one of Input A OR Input B is receiving Green. Outputs a Red Signal when neither Input A or Input B are receiving Green.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATEOR.OU: Sends a Green Signal if any Input is receiving Green
Sends a Red Signal if both Inputs are receiving Red
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATEXOR.D: This gate outputs a Green Signal if exactly one of its Inputs is receiving a Green Signal.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATEXOR.E: Outputs a Green Signal if exactly one of its Inputs is receiving Green. Outputs a Red Signal if both or neither Inputs are receiving a Green Signal.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATEXOR.O: Sends a Green Signal if exactly one of its Inputs is receiving Green
Sends a Red Signal if both Input signals match (any color)
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICMEMORY.DE: A Memory stores a Green Signal received in the Set Port (S) until the Reset Port (R) receives a Green Signal.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICMEMORY.EF: Contains an internal Memory, and will output whatever signal is stored in that Memory. Signals sent to the Inputs only affect the Memory, and do not pass through to the Output. Sending a Green Signal to the Set Port (S) will set the memory to Green. Sending a Green Signal to the Reset Port (R) will reset the memory back to Red.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICMEMORY.RE: Outputs a Green Signal if the internal Memory is set to Green
Outputs a Red Signal if the internal Memory is set to Red
Green Signal: Reset the internal Memory to Red
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICMEMORY.SE: Green Signal: Set the internal Memory to Green
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICPOWERRELA: Automated systems save power and time by removing the need for Duplicant input.

Connects to an <link="LOGIC">Automation</link> grid to automatically turn <link="POWER">Power</link> on or off.

Does not affect circuitry preceding the switch.
Red Signal: Prevent Power from flowing through connected circuits
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICPRESSURES: Atmo sensors can be used to prevent excess oxygen production and overpressurization.
Sends a Green Signal or a Red Signal when Gas pressure enters the chosen range.
Sends a Green Signal if Gas pressure is within the selected range
A hydro sensor can tell a pump to refill its basin as soon as it contains too little liquid.
Sends a Green Signal or a Red Signal when Liquid pressure enters the chosen range. Must be submerged in Liquid.
Sends a Green Signal if Liquid pressure is within the selected range
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICSWITCH.DE: Signal switches don't turn grids on and off like power switches, but add an extra signal.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICSWITCH.EF: Sends a Green Signal or a Red Signal on an Automation grid. Must be manually toggled by a Duplicant.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICSWITCH.LO: Sends a Green Signal if toggled ON
Sends a Red Signal if toggled OFF
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICTEMPERATU: Thermo sensors can disable buildings when they approach dangerous temperatures.
Sends a Green Signal or a Red Signal when ambient Temperature enters the chosen range.
Sends a Green Signal if ambient Temperature is within the selected range
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICTIMEOFDAY: Clock sensors ensure systems always turn on at the same time, day or night, every cycle.
Sets an automatic Green Signal and Red Signal schedule using a timer.
Sends a Green Signal if current time is within the selected Green range
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICWIRE.DESC: Automation wire is used to connect building ports to automation gates.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICWIRE.EFFE:
Connects buildings to <link="LOGIC">Sensors</link>.

Can be run through wall and floor tile.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICWIRE.NAME: <link="LOGICWIRE">Automation Wire</link>
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICWIREBRIDG: Wire bridges allow multiple automation grids to exist in a small area without connecting.

Runs one <link="LOGICWIRE">Automation Wire</link> section over another without joining them.

Can be run through wall and floor tile.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LUXURYBED.DESC: Duplicants prefer comfy beds to cots and gain more stamina from sleeping in them.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LUXURYBED.EFFE:
Provides a sleeping area for one Duplicant and restores additional <link="STAMINA">Stamina</link>.

Duplicants will automatically sleep in their assigned beds at night.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LUXURYBED.NAME: <link="LUXURYBED">Comfy Bed</link>
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MACHINESHOP.DE: Duplicants will only improve the efficiency of buildings in the same room as this station.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MACHINESHOP.EF:
Allows the assigned <link="MACHINETECHNICIAN">Engineer</link> to improve building production efficiency.

This building is a necessary component of the Machine Shop room.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MANUALGENERATO: Watching Duplicants run on it is adorable... the electrical power is just an added bonus.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MANUALPRESSURE: Airlocks can quarter off dangerous areas and prevent gases from seeping into the colony.

Blocks <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> and <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> flow, maintaining pressure between areas.

Wild <link="CRITTERS">Critters</link> cannot pass through doors.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MARBLESCULPTUR: Duplicants who have learned art skills can produce more decorative sculptures.

Majorly increases <link="DECOR">Decor</link>, contributing to <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.

Must be sculpted by a Duplicant.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MASSAGETABLE.A: Duplicants must take a break when their stress reaches {0}
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MASSAGETABLE.D: Breaktime ends when stress is reduced to {0}
Massage tables quickly reduce extreme stress, at the cost of power production.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MASSAGETABLE.E:
Rapidly reduces <link="STRESS">Stress</link> for the Duplicant user.

Duplicants will automatically seek a massage table when <link="STRESS">Stress</link> exceeds breaktime range.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MASSIVEHEATSIN:
A self-sustaining machine powered by what appears to be refined <link="UNOBTANIUM">Neutronium</link>.

Absorbs and neutralizes <link="HEAT">Heat</link> energy when provided with piped <link="HYDROGEN">Hydrogen</link>.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MECHANICALSURF: Mechanical waves make for radical relaxation time.

Increases Duplicant <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.

Some <link="WATER">Water</link> gets splashed on the floor during use.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MEDICALCOT.DES: Duplicants use triage cots to recover from physical injuries and receive aid from peers.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MEDICALCOT.EFF:
Accelerates <link="HEALTH">Health</link> restoration and the healing of physical injuries.

Revives incapacitated Duplicants.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MESHTILE.DESC: Mesh tile can be used to make Duplicant pathways in areas where liquid flows.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MESHTILE.EFFEC:
Used to build the walls and floors of rooms.

Does not obstruct <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> or <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> flow.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MESHTILE.NAME: <link="MESHTILE">Mesh Tile</link>
Refined metals are necessary to build advanced electronics and technologies.

Produces <link="REFINEDMETAL">Refined Metals</link> from raw <link="RAWMETAL">Metal Ore</link>.

Significantly <link="HEAT">Heats</link> and outputs the <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> piped into it.

Duplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.METALSCULPTURE: Duplicants who have learned art skills can produce more decorative sculptures.

Majorly increases <link="DECOR">Decor</link>, contributing to <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.

Must be sculpted by a Duplicant.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.METALTILE.DESC: Heat travels much more quickly through metal tile than other types of flooring.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.METALTILE.EFFE:
Used to build the walls and floors of rooms.

Significantly increases Duplicant runspeed.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.METALTILE.NAME: <link="METALTILE">Metal Tile</link>
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.METHANEGENERAT: Natural gas generators leak polluted water and are best built above a waste reservoir.

Converts <link="METHANE">Natural Gas</link> into electrical <link="POWER">Power</link>.

Produces <link="CARBONDIOXIDE">Carbon Dioxide</link> and <link="DIRTYWATER">Polluted Water</link>.
Musher recipes will keep Duplicants fed, but may impact health and morale over time.

Produces low quality <link="FOOD">Food</link> using common ingredients.

Duplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MINERALDEOXIDI: Oxygen diffusers are inefficient, but output enough oxygen to keep a colony breathing.

Converts large amounts of <link="ALGAE">Algae</link> into <link="OXYGEN">Oxygen</link>.

Becomes idle when the area reaches maximum pressure capacity.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MONUMENTBOTTOM: The base of a monument must be constructed first.

Builds the bottom section of a Great Monument.

Can be customized.

A Great Monument must be built to achieve the Colonize Imperative.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MONUMENTMIDDLE: Customized sections of a Great Monument can be mixed and matched.

Builds the middle section of a Great Monument.

Can be customized.

A Great Monument must be built to achieve the Colonize Imperative.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MONUMENTTOP.DE: Building a Great Monument will declare to the universe that this hunk of rock is your own.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MONUMENTTOP.EF:
Builds the top section of a Great Monument.

Can be customized.

A Great Monument must be built to achieve the Colonize Imperative.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MOULDINGTILE.D: Trimming is used as purely decorative lining for walls and structures.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MOULDINGTILE.E:
Used to build the walls and floors of rooms.

Increases <link="DECOR">Decor</link>, contributing to <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.NUCLEARREACTOR: Makes an absurd amount of heat
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OBJECTDISPENSE: Automatic dispensers will store and drop resources in small quantities.
Stores any Solid Materials delivered to it by Duplicants. Dumps stored materials back into the world when it receives a Green Signal.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OILREFINERY.DE: Petroleum can only be produced from the refinement of crude oil.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OILWELLCAP.DES: Water pumped into an oil reservoir cannot be recovered.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OILWELLCAP.EFF:
Extracts <link="CRUDEOIL">Crude Oil</link> using clean <link="WATER">Water</link>.

Must be built atop an <link="OILWELL">Oil Reservoir</link>.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ORESCRUBBER.DE: Scrubbers sanitize freshly mined materials before they're brought into the colony.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ORESCRUBBER.EF: Kills a significant amount of <link="DISEASE">Germs</link> present on <link="RAWMINERAL">Raw Ore</link>.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OUTHOUSE.DESC: The colony that eats together, excretes together.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OUTHOUSE.EFFEC:
Gives Duplicants a place to relieve themselves.

Requires no <link="LIQUIDPIPING">Piping</link>.

Must be periodically emptied of <link="TOXICSAND">Polluted Dirt</link>.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OUTHOUSE.NAME: <link="OUTHOUSE">Outhouse</link>
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OXIDIZERTANK.D: Solid oxidizers allows rocket fuel to be efficiently burned in the vacuum of space.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OXIDIZERTANKLI: Liquid oxygen improves the thrust-to-mass ratio of rocket fuels.
Stores <link="LIQUIDOXYGEN">Liquid Oxygen</link> for burning rocket fuels.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OXYLITEREFINER: Oxylite is a solid and easily transportable source of consumable oxygen.
Synthesizes <link="OXYROCK">Oxylite</link> using <link="OXYGEN">Oxygen</link> and a small amount of <link="GOLD">Gold</link>.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PARKSIGN.DESC: Passing through parks will increase Duplicant Morale.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PARKSIGN.EFFEC: Classifies an area as a Park or Nature Reserve.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PARKSIGN.NAME: <link="PARKSIGN">Park Sign</link>
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PETROLEUMGENER: Petroleum generators have a high energy output but produce a great deal of waste.

Converts <link="PETROLEUM">Petroleum</link> into electrical <link="POWER">Power</link>.

Produces <link="CARBONDIOXIDE">Carbon Dioxide</link> and <link="DIRTYWATER">Polluted Water</link>.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PHONOBOX.DESC: Dancing helps Duplicants get their innermost feelings out.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PHONOBOX.EFFEC:
Plays music for Duplicants to dance to on their breaks.

Increases Duplicant <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PHONOBOX.NAME: <link="PHONOBOX">Jukebot</link>
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PLANTERBOX.DES: Domestically grown seeds mature more quickly than wild plants.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PLASTICTILE.DE: Plastic tile is mildly antiseptic and can help limit the spread of germs in a colony.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PLASTICTILE.EF:
Used to build the walls and floors of rooms.

Significantly increases Duplicant runspeed.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.POIBUNKEREXTER: A strong door with a sophisticated genetic lock.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.POIDOORINTERNA: A strong door with a sophisticated genetic lock.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.POIFACILITYDOO: Large double doors that were once the main entrance to a large facility.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.POLYMERIZER.DE: Plastic can be used to craft unique buildings and goods.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.POWERCONTROLST: Only one Duplicant may be assigned to a station at a time.

Produces <link="POWERSTATIONTOOLS">Microchip</link> to increase the <link="POWER">Power</link> output of generators.

Assigned Duplicants must possess the <link="POWERTECHNICIAN">Tune Up</link> trait.

This building is a necessary component of the Power Plant room.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.POWERTRANSFORM: Connect <link="BATTERY">Batteries</link> on the large side to act as a valve and prevent <link="WIRE">Wires</link> from drawing more than 4 kW.
Limits <link="POWER">Power</link> flowing through the Transformer to 4 kW.
Connect <link="BATTERY">Batteries</link> on the large side to act as a valve and prevent <link="WIRE">Wires</link> from drawing more than 1000 W and suffering overload damage.
Limits <link="POWER">Power</link> flowing through the Transformer to 1000 W.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PRESSUREDOOR.D: Mechanized airlocks open and close more quickly than other types of door.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PRESSUREDOOR.E:
Blocks <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> and <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> flow, maintaining pressure between areas.

Functions as a <link="MANUALPRESSUREDOOR">Manual Airlock</link> when no <link="POWER">Power</link> is available.

Wild <link="CRITTERS">Critters</link> cannot pass through doors.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PRESSURESWITCH: An atmo switch shuts off power when the air pressure surrounding it surpasses the set threshold.

Automatically turns <link="POWER">Power</link> on or off using ambient <link="PRESSURE">Gas Pressure</link> .

Does not affect circuitry preceding the switch.
A hydro switch shuts off power when the liquid pressure surrounding it surpasses the set threshold.

Automatically turns <link="POWER">Power</link> on or off using ambient <link="PRESSURE">Liquid Pressure</link>.

Does not affect circuitry preceding the switch.

Must be submerged in <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link>.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PROPCLOCK.DESC:
A simple wall clock.

It is no longer ticking.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PROPCLOCK.NAME: Clock
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PROPDESK.DESC: An intact office desk, decorated with several personal belongings and a barely functioning computer.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PROPDESK.NAME: Computer Desk
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PROPELEVATOR.D:
Out of service.

The buttons inside indicate it went down more than a dozen floors at one point in time.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PROPFACILITYCH: A chair where visitors can comfortably wait before their appointments.

A large chandelier that hangs from the ceiling.

It does not appear to function.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PROPFACILITYCO: A couch where visitors can comfortably wait before their appointments.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PROPFACILITYDE:
A spotless desk filled with impeccably organized office supplies.

A photo peeks out from beneath the desk pad, depicting two beaming young women in caps and gowns.

The photo is quite old.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PROPFACILITYDI:
An electronic display projecting the blueprint of a familiar device.

It looks like a Printing Pod.

An electronic display projecting the blueprint of a familiar device.

It looks like a Mining Gun.

An electronic display projecting the blueprint of a strange device.

Perhaps these displays were used to entice visitors.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PROPFACILITYGL:
A filing cabinet for storing hard copy employee records.

The contents have been shredded.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PROPFACILITYLA:
A long light fixture that hangs from the ceiling.

It does not appear to function.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PROPFACILITYPA:
A painting featuring a copse of fir trees and a magnificent mountain range on the horizon.

The air in the room prickles with the sensation that I'm not meant to be here.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PROPFACILITYST:
A large, modern sculpture that sits in the center of the lobby.

It's an artistic cross between an hourglass shape and a double helix.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PROPFACILITYTA: A low coffee table that may have once held old science magazines.
It's survived the vacuum of space by virtue of being plastic.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PROPFACILITYWA: Certification in Applied Physics, awarded in recognition of one "Jacquelyn A. Stern".
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PROPLIGHT.DESC: An elegant ceiling lamp, slightly worse for wear.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PROPLIGHT.NAME: Light Fixture
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PROPRECEPTIOND:
A full coffee cup and a note abandoned mid sentence sit behind the desk.

It gives me an eerie feeling, as if the receptionist has stepped out and will return any moment.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PROPSKELETON.D:
A detailed anatomical model.

It appears to be made of resin.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PROPSURFACESAT: All that remains of a once peacefully orbiting satellite.
All that remains of a once peacefully orbiting satellite.
All that remains of a once peacefully orbiting satellite.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PROPTABLE.NAME: Table
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.RANCHSTATION.D: Grooming critters make them look nice, smell pretty, feel happy, and produce more.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.RANCHSTATION.E:
Allows the assigned <link="RANCHER">Rancher</link> to care for <link="CRITTERS">Critters</link>.

Assigned Duplicants must possess the <link="RANCHER">Critter Wrangling</link> trait.

This building is a necessary component of the Stable room.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.RATIONBOX.DESC: Ration boxes keep food safe from hungry critters, but don't slow food spoilage.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.RATIONBOX.EFFE:
Stores a small amount of <link="FOOD">Food</link>.

Food must be delivered to boxes by Duplicants.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.RATIONBOX.NAME: <link="RATIONBOX">Ration Box</link>
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.REFRIGERATOR.D: Food spoilage can be slowed by ambient conditions as well as by refrigerators.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.REFRIGERATOR.E: Stores <link="FOOD">Food</link> at an ideal <link="HEAT">Temperature</link> to prevent spoilage.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.RESEARCHCENTER: Research stations are necessary for unlocking all research tiers.
Conducts <link="RESEARCH">Novice Research</link> to unlock new technologies.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.RESEARCHMODULE: Data banks can be used at virtual planetariums to produce additional research.

Completes one <link="RESEARCH">Research Task</link> per space mission.

Produces a small Data Bank regardless of mission destination.

Generated <link="RESEARCH">Research Points</link> become available upon the rocket's return.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.RESETSKILLSSTA: Erase skills from a Duplicant's mind, returning them to their default abilities.

Refunds a Duplicant's Skill Points for reassignment.

Duplicants will lose all assigned skills in the process.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ROCKCRUSHER.DE: Rock Crushers loosen nuggets from raw ore and can process many different resources.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ROCKCRUSHER.EF:
Inefficiently produces refined materials from raw resources.

Duplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ROCKCRUSHER.LI: Crushes {0} into {1} and a small amount of pure {2}
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ROLESTATION.DE: A skills board can teach special skills to Duplicants they can't learn on their own.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ROLESTATION.EF: Allows Duplicants to spend Skill Points to learn new <link="JOBS">Skills</link>.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.RUSTDEOXIDIZER: Rust and salt goes in, oxygen comes out.

Converts <link="RUST">Rust</link> into <link="OXYGEN">Oxygen</link> and <link="CHLORINE">Chlorine</link>.

Becomes idle when the area reaches maximum pressure capacity.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SAUNA.DESC: A steamy sauna soothes away all the aches and pains.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SAUNA.EFFECT:
Uses <link="STEAM">Steam</link> to create a relaxing atmosphere.

Increases Duplicant <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SAUNA.NAME: <link="SAUNA">Sauna</link>
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SCULPTURE.DESC: Duplicants who have learned art skills can produce more decorative sculptures.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SCULPTURE.EFFE:
Moderately increases <link="DECOR">Decor</link>, contributing to <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.

Must be sculpted by a Duplicant.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SCULPTURE.NAME: <link="SCULPTURE">Large Sculpting Block</link>
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SETLOCKER.DESC:
A basic metal locker.

It contains an assortment of personal effects.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SETLOCKER.NAME: Locker
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SHEARINGSTATIO: Shearing stations allow <link="DRECKO">Dreckos</link> to be safely sheared for useful raw materials.
Allows the assigned Rancher to shear Dreckos.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SHOWER.DESC: Regularly showering will prevent Duplicants spreading germs to the things they touch.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SHOWER.NAME: <link="SHOWER">Shower</link>
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SMALLSCULPTURE: Duplicants who have learned art skills can produce more decorative sculptures.

Minorly increases <link="DECOR">Decor</link>, contributing to <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.

Must be sculpted by a Duplicant.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SODAFOUNTAIN.D: Sparkling water puts a twinkle in a Duplicant's eye.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SODAFOUNTAIN.E:
Creates soda from <link="WATER">Water</link> and <link="CARBONDIOXIDE">Carbon Dioxide</link>.

Consuming soda water increases Duplicant <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SOLARPANEL.DES: Solar panels convert high intensity sunlight into power and produce zero waste.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SOLARPANEL.EFF:
Converts <link="LIGHT">Sunlight</link> into electrical <link="POWER">Power</link>.

Must be exposed to space.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SOLIDBOOSTER.D: Additional thrusters allow rockets to reach far away space destinations.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SOLIDBOOSTER.E: Burns <link="IRON">Refined Iron</link> and <link="OXYROCK">Oxylite</link> to increase rocket exploration distance.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SOLIDCONDUIT.D: Rails move materials where they'll be needed most, saving Duplicants the walk.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SOLIDCONDUIT.E:
Transports <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid Materials</link> on a track between <link="SOLIDCONDUITINBOX">Conveyor Loader</link> and <link="SOLIDCONDUITOUTBOX">Conveyor Receptacle</link>.

Can be run through wall and floor tile.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SOLIDCONDUITBR: Separating rail systems helps ensure materials go to the intended destinations.

Runs one <link="SOLIDCONDUIT">Conveyor Rail</link> section over another without joining them.

Can be run through wall and floor tile.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SOLIDCONDUITIN: Material filters can be used to determine what resources are sent down the rail.

Loads <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid Materials</link> onto <link="SOLIDCONDUIT">Conveyor Rail</link> for transport.

Only loads the resources of your choosing.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SOLIDCONDUITOU: When materials reach the end of a rail they enter a receptacle to be used by Duplicants.
Unloads <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid Materials</link> from a <link="SOLIDCONDUIT">Conveyor Rail</link> into storage.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SOLIDLOGICVALV: Automated conveyors save power and time by removing the need for Duplicant input.
Connects to an <link="LOGIC">Automation</link> grid to automatically turn <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid Material</link> transport on or off.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SOLIDTRANSFERA: An auto-sweeper's range can be viewed at any time by clicking on the building.

Automates <link="CHORES">Sweeping</link> and <link="CHORES">Supplying</link> errands by sucking up all nearby <link="DECOR">Debris</link>.

Materials are automatically delivered to any <link="SOLIDCONDUITINBOX">Conveyor Loader</link>, <link="SOLIDCONDUITOUTBOX">Conveyor Receptacle</link>, storage, or buildings within range.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SOLIDVENT.DESC: When materials reach the end of a rail they are dropped back into the world.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SOLIDVENT.EFFE: Unloads <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid Materials</link> from a <link="SOLIDCONDUIT">Conveyor Rail</link> onto the floor.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SOLIDVENT.NAME: <link="SOLIDVENT">Conveyor Chute</link>
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SPACEHEATER.DE: A space heater will radiate heat for as long as it's powered.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SPECIALCARGOBA: Biological cargo bays allow Duplicants to retrieve alien plants and wildlife from space.

Allows Duplicants to store unusual or organic resources found during space missions.

Stored resources become available to the colony upon the rocket's return.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.STEAMENGINE.DE: Rockets can be used to send Duplicants into space and retrieve rare resources.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.STEAMENGINE.EF:
Utilizes <link="STEAM">Steam</link> to propel rockets for space exploration.

The engine of a rocket must be built first before more rocket modules may be added.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.STEAMTURBINE.D: Useful for converting the geothermal energy of magma into usable power.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.STEAMTURBINE.E:
THIS BUILDING HAS BEEN DEPRECATED AND CANNOT BE BUILT.

Generates exceptional electrical <link="POWER">Power</link> using pressurized, <link="HEAT">Scalding</link> <link="STEAM">Steam</link>.

Outputs significantly cooler <link="STEAM">Steam</link> than it receives.

Air pressure beneath this building must be higher than pressure above for air to flow.
Useful for converting the geothermal energy into usable power.

Draws in <link="STEAM">Steam</link> from the tiles directly below the machine's foundation and uses it to generate electrical <link="POWER">Power</link>.

Outputs <link="WATER">Water</link>.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.STICKERBOMB.DE: Surprise decor sneak attacks a Duplicant's gloomy day.
Resources left on the floor become "debris" and lower Decor when not put away.
Stores the Solid resources of your choosing.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.STORAGELOCKERS: Smart storage bins allow for the automation of resource organization based on type and mass.
Stores the Solid resources of your choosing. Sends a Green Signal when bin is full.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SUITFABRICATOR: Exosuits can be filled with oxygen to allow Duplicants to safely enter hazardous areas.

Forges protective <link="EXOSUIT">Exosuits</link> for Duplicants to wear.

Duplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SUITLOCKER.DES: An atmo suit dock will empty atmo suits of waste, but only one suit can charge at a time.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SUITLOCKER.EFF:
Stores and recharges <link="ATMOSUIT">Atmo Suits</link>.

Build next to an <link="SUITMARKER">Atmo Suit Checkpoint</link> to make Duplicants change into suits when passing by.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SUITMARKER.DES: A checkpoint must have an atmo suit dock built on the opposite side its arrow faces.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SUITMARKER.EFF:
Marks a threshold where Duplicants must change into or out of <link="ATMOSUIT">Atmo Suits</link>.

Must be built next to an <link="SUITLOCKER">Atmo Suit Dock</link>.

Can be rotated before construction.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SUNLAMP.EFFECT:
Gives off <link="LIGHT">Sunlight</link> level Lux. 

Can be paired with <link="BEACHCHAIR">Beach Chair</link>.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SUNLAMP.NAME: <link="SUNLAMP">Sun Lamp</link>
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SUPERMATERIALR: Rare materials can be procured through rocket missions into space.

Processes <link="RAREMATERIALS">Rare Materials</link> into advanced industrial goods.

Rare materials can be retrieved from space missions.

Duplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
Super Coolant is an industrial grade <link="FULLERENE">Fullerene</link> coolant.
Insulation reduces <link="HEAT">Heat Transfer</link> and is composed of recrystallized <link="KATAIRITE">Abyssalite</link>.
Thermium is an industrial metal alloy formulated to maximize <link="HEAT">Heat Transfer</link> and thermal dispersion.
Visco-Gel is a <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> polymer with high surface tension.
Yellowcake is a <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid</link> used in uranium enrichment.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SWITCH.DESC: Switches can only affect buildings that come after them on a circuit.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SWITCH.EFFECT:
Turns <link="POWER">Power</link> on or off.

Does not affect circuitry preceding the switch.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SWITCH.NAME: <link="SWITCH">Switch</link>
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.TELESCOPE.DESC: Telescopes are necessary for learning starmaps and conducting rocket missions.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.TELESCOPE.EFFE:
Maps Starmap destinations.

Assigned Duplicants must possess the <link="RESEARCHER">Geographical Analysis</link> trait.

Building must be exposed to space to function.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.TELESCOPE.NAME: <link="TELESCOPE">Telescope</link>
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.TELESCOPE.REQU: A steady {0} supply is required to sustain working Duplicants.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.TEMPERATURECON: Automated switches can be used to manage circuits in areas where Duplicants cannot enter.

Automatically turns <link="POWER">Power</link> on or off using ambient <link="HEAT">Temperature</link>.

Does not affect circuitry preceding the switch.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.THERMALBLOCK.D: The thermal properties of construction materials determine their heat retention.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.THERMALBLOCK.E:
Accelerates or buffers <link="HEAT">Heat</link> dispersal based on the construction material used.

Has a small area of effect.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.TILE.DESC: Tile can be used to bridge gaps and get to unreachable areas.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.TILE.EFFECT:
Used to build the walls and floors of rooms.

Increases Duplicant runspeed.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.TILE.NAME: <link="TILE">Tile</link>
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.TILEPOI.EFFECT: Used to build the walls and floor of rooms.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.TILEPOI.NAME: <link="TILEPOI">Tile</link>
An astronaut must accompany sight seeing Duplicants on rocket flights.

Allows one non-Astronaut Duplicant to visit space.

Sight-Seeing rocket flights decrease <link="STRESS">Stress</link>.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.TRAVELTUBE.DES: Duplicants will only exit a transit tube when a safe landing area is available beneath it.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.TRAVELTUBE.EFF:
Quickly transports Duplicants from a <link="TRAVELTUBEENTRANCE">Transit Tube Access</link> to the tube's end.

Only transports Duplicants.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.TRAVELTUBEENTR: Duplicants require access points to enter tubes, but not to exit them.

Allows Duplicants to enter the connected <link="TRAVELTUBE">Transit Tube</link> system.

Stops drawing <link="POWER">Power</link> once fully charged.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.TRAVELTUBEWALL: Tube crossings can run transit tubes through walls without leaking gas or liquid.

Allows <link="TRAVELTUBE">Transit Tubes</link> to be run through wall and floor tile.

Functions as regular tile.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.URANIUMCENTRIF: Enriched uranium is a specialized substance that can be used to fuel powerful nuclear reactors.

Extracts <link="ENRICHEDURANIUM">Enriched Uranium</link> from <link="URANIUMORE">Uranium Ore</link>.

Outputs <link="DEPLETEDURANIUM">Depleted Uranium</link> in molten form.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.VERTICALWINDTU: Duplicants love the feeling of high-powered wind through their hair.

Must be connected to <link="GASPIPING">Gas Pipes</link> and a <link="POWER">Power Source</link>.

Increases Duplicants <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WASHBASIN.DESC: Germ spread can be reduced by building these where Duplicants often get dirty.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WASHBASIN.EFFE:
Removes some <link="DISEASE">Germs</link> from Duplicants.

Germ-covered Duplicants use Wash Basins when passing by in the selected direction.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WASHBASIN.NAME: <link="WASHBASIN">Wash Basin</link>
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WASHSINK.DESC: Sinks are plumbed and do not need to be manually emptied or refilled.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WASHSINK.EFFEC:
Removes <link="DISEASE">Germs</link> from Duplicants.

Germ-covered Duplicants use Sinks when passing by in the selected direction.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WASHSINK.NAME: <link="WASHSINK">Sink</link>
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WATERCOOLER.DE: Chatting with friends improves Duplicants' moods and reduces their stress.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WATERCOOLER.EF:
Provides a gathering place for Duplicants during Downtime.

Improves Duplicant <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.
Sieves cannot kill germs and pass any they receive into their waste and water output.

Produces clean <link="WATER">Water</link> from <link="DIRTYWATER">Polluted Water</link> using <link="SAND">Sand</link>.

Produces <link="TOXICSAND">Polluted Dirt</link>.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WIRE.DESC: Electrical wire is used to connect generators, batteries, and buildings.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WIRE.EFFECT:
Connects buildings to <link="POWER">Power</link> sources.

Can be run through wall and floor tile.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WIRE.NAME: <link="WIRE">Wire</link>
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WIREBRIDGE.DES: Splitting generators onto separate grids can prevent overloads and wasted electricity.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WIREBRIDGE.EFF:
Runs one wire section over another without joining them.

Can be run through wall and floor tile.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WIREBRIDGEHIGH: Joint plates can run Heavi-Watt wires through walls without leaking gas or liquid.

Allows <link="HIGHWATTAGEWIRE">Heavi-Watt Wire</link> to be run through wall and floor tile.

Functions as regular tile.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WIREREFINED.DE: My Duplicants prefer the look of conductive wire to the regular raggedy stuff.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WIREREFINED.EF:
Connects buildings to <link="POWER">Power</link> sources.

Can be run through wall and floor tile.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WIREREFINEDBRI: Splitting generators onto separate systems can prevent overloads and wasted electricity.

Carries more <link="POWER">Wattage</link> than a regular <link="WIREBRIDGE">Wire Bridge</link> without overloading.

Runs one wire section over another without joining them.

Can be run through wall and floor tile.
Joint plates can run Heavi-Watt wires through walls without leaking gas or liquid.

Carries more <link="POWER">Wattage</link> than a regular <link="WIREBRIDGEHIGHWATTAGE">Heavi-Watt Joint Plate</link> without overloading.

Allows <link="HIGHWATTAGEWIRE">Heavi-Watt Wire</link> to be run through wall and floor tile.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WIREREFINEDHIG: Higher wattage wire is used to avoid power overloads, particularly for strong generators.

Carries more <link="POWER">Wattage</link> than regular <link="WIRE">Wire</link> without overloading.

Cannot be run through wall and floor tile.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WOODGASGENERAT: Wood burners are small and easy to maintain, but produce a fair amount of heat.

Burns <link="WOOD">Lumber</link> to produce electrical <link="POWER">Power</link>.

Produces <link="CARBONDIOXIDE">Carbon Dioxide</link> and <link="HEAT">Heat</link>.
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.REPAIRABLE.DISABLE_AUT: Only repair this building when ordered
STRINGS.BUILDINGS.REPAIRABLE.ENABLE_AUTO: Automatically repair this building when damaged
STRINGS.CODEX.A0_PRELIMINARYCALCULATIONS:
<indent=5%>Director,

Even with dramatic optimization we can't fit the massive volume of resources needed for a colony seed aboard the craft, even when calculating for a very small interplanetary travel duration.

Some serious changes are gonna have to be made for this to work.</indent>

XOXO,
[REDACTED]
<size=11>Information and Statistics Department
The Gravitas Facility</size>
------------------
STRINGS.CODEX.A0_PROPFACILITYDISPLAY1.BO:
Introducing the latest in 3D printing technology:
The Gravitas Home Printing Pod

We are proud to announce that printing advancements developed here in the Gravitas Facility will soon bring new, bio-organic production capabilities to your old home printers.

What does that mean for the average household?

Dinner frustrations are a thing of the past. Simply select any of the pod's 5398 pre-programmed recipes, and voila! Delicious pot roast ready in only .87 seconds.

Prefer the patented family recipe? Program your own custom meal template for an instant taste of home, or go old school and create fresh, delicious ingredients and prepare your own home cooked meal.

Dinnertime has never been easier!

Projected for commercial availability early next year.
Brought to you by the Gravitas Facility.
STRINGS.CODEX.A0_PROPFACILITYDISPLAY2.BO:
Bring your mining operations into the twenty-third century with new Gravitas personal excavators.

Improved particle condensers reduce raw volume for more efficient product shipping - and that's good for your bottom line.

Licensed for industrial use only, resale of Gravitas equipment may carry a fine of up to $200,000 under the Global Restoration Act.
Brought to you by the Gravitas Facility.
STRINGS.CODEX.A0_PROPFACILITYDISPLAY3.BO:
Brought to you by the Gravitas Facility.
<smallcaps>Patent Pending</smallcaps>
STRINGS.CODEX.A1_A046.BODY.CONTAINER1:
Gravitas has been growing pretty rapidly since our first product hit the market. I just got a look at some of the new hires - they're practically babies! Not quite what I was expecting, but then I've never had an opportunity to mentor someone before. Could be fun!
------------------
STRINGS.CODEX.A1_A046.BODY.CONTAINER2:
Well, mentorship hasn't gone quite how I'd expected. Turns out the young hires don't need me to show them the ropes. Actually, since the facility's gotten rid of our swipe cards one of the nice young men had to show me how to operate the doors after I got stuck outside my own lab. Don't I feel silly.
------------------
STRINGS.CODEX.A1_A046.BODY.CONTAINER3:
Well, if that isn't just gravy, hm? One of the new hires will be acting as the team lead on my next project.

When I first started it wasn't that uncommon to sample a whole rack of test tubes by hand. Now a machine can do hundreds of them in seconds. Who knows what this job will look like in another ten or twenty years. Will I still even be in it?
------------------
STRINGS.CODEX.A1_A046.BODY.CONTAINER4:
That nice young man who helped me with the door the other day, Mr. Kraus, has been an absolute angel. He's been kind enough to help me with this horrible e-mail system and even showed me how to digitize my research notes. I'm learning a lot. Turns out I wasn't the mentor, I'm the mentee! If that isn't a chuckle. At any rate, I feel like I have a better handle on things around here due to Mr. Kraus' help. Turns out you're never too old to stop learning!
------------------
STRINGS.CODEX.A1_A046.SUBTITLE: ENCRYPTION LEVEL: NONE
STRINGS.CODEX.A1_A046.TITLE: Personal Journal: A046
STRINGS.CODEX.A1_CLONEDRATS.BODY.CONTAIN:
<smallcaps>[Voice Recognition Initialized]
[Subject Identified: B111]</smallcaps>

[LOG BEGINS]

[A throat clears.]
